bugs.title: rpm: Out-of-bounds heap read triggered by crafted RPM file

bugzilla.short_desc: rpm: Out-of-bounds heap read triggered by crafted RPM file

long_desc.thetext: Out-of-bounds heap read in rpmtdGetNumber triggered by crafted RPM file was found.

Acknowledgments:

Name: Hanno Boeck

Created rpm tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1329123]

Fixed upstream by commit b722cf86 : 
https://github.com/rpm-software-management/rpm/commit/b722cf86

Red Hat Product Security has determined this issue is not planned to be fixed. If a customer is requesting this fix, please attach any customer contact cases to the bug and email secalert@redhat.com to inform us of the customer request. Product Security will re-open issues with significant customer interest provided they are within support scope.
rpm-4.13.0-0.rc1.13.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
rpm-4.13.0-0.rc1.27.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
rpm-4.12.0.1-17.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

Well done!
https://pineconellc.github.io/

bugs.title: rpm: Null pointer dereference in rstrdup

bugzilla.short_desc: rpm: Null pointer dereference in rstrdup

long_desc.thetext: Null pointer dereference in rstrdup triggered by crafted RPM file causing minor crash was reported.

Acknowledgments:

Name: Hanno Boeck

Created rpm tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1329122]

Fixed upstream by commit cddf43 :
https://github.com/rpm-software-management/rpm/commit/cddf43a

Red Hat Product Security has determined this issue is not planned to be fixed. If a customer is requesting this fix, please attach any customer contact cases to the bug and email secalert@redhat.com to inform us of the customer request. Product Security will re-open issues with significant customer interest provided they are within support scope.
rpm-4.13.0-0.rc1.13.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
rpm-4.13.0-0.rc1.27.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
rpm-4.12.0.1-17.fc22 has been pushed to the Fedora 22 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the

NOTE: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora. While only
one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at
the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each other,
you may clone this bug as appropriate.

bug.title: rpm: Null pointer dereference in rstrdup
rpm: Null pointer dereference in rstrdup [fedora-all]
rpm: Out-of-bounds heap read triggered by crafted RPM file
rpm: Out-of-bounds heap read triggered by crafted RPM file [fedora-all]

notes:
* Fix sigsegv in stringFormat() (rhbz:1316903)
* Fix reading rpmtd behind its size in formatValue() (rhbz:1316896)
title: rpm-4.13.0-0.rc1.13.fc23
